articles.title: Powerful 'megamaser' space laser spotted by South African telescope - CNN
articles.description: Astronomers have detected a powerful radiowave laser, known as a megamaser, in space. This record-breaking megamaser is the most distant one ever observed at 5 billion light-years away from Earth.
